entry.title: The new obfuscation patch & GetStats
entry.summary: James O'Beirne confirmed a bug and filed a fix for it on GitHub. Daniel, who reported the issue, expressed gratitude for the quick fix and had planned to submit a patch in case the issue was an oversight. James will also be writing tests to prevent any future regressions. Daniel's signature block includes links to his website, OpenPGP key, and Namecoin ID.
